name: Rolladice
0:
”Alexa, open roll a dice”
”Alexa, start roll a dice”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: roll a dice
des:
Next time you have you dice missing while playing your favorite board game, just ask Alexa for help. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
